Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Unit tests fail in fabric-daily-s390x CI job due to gossip service error.
Issue.description: ERRO 020 Tried joining channel foo but our org( SampleOrg ), isn't among the orgs of the channel: ORG1 , aborting. 03:53:24 unit-tests_1 | 2018-05-04 03:51:19.810 UTC ConnProducer NewConnection -> ERRO 034 Failed connecting to localhost:7050 , error: context deadline exceeded 03:53:25 unit-tests_1 | 2018-05-04 03:52:37.828 UTC gossip/service updateAnchors -> ERRO 078 Tried joining channel A but our org( OrgMSP0 ), isn't among the orgs of the channel: Org0 , aborting. {code} *fabric Commit: d34b43f* *Build Log* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-daily-s390x/145/ >
